uvi.description:
net: caif: fix memory leak in ldisc_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.274 by commit 45a99589a9a3445dce114060f3b52f2df13bc79b. For more details please see the references link.
